result.title: Invitation to the June Cook-off 2014 on CodeChef
result.content:
CodeChef invites you to participate in the June Cook-off 2014 at http://www.codechef.com/COOK47.

Time: 22nd June 2014 (2130 hrs) to 23rd June 2014 (0000 hrs). (Indian Standard Time — +5:30 GMT) — Check your timezone.

Details: http://www.codechef.com/COOK47/

Registration: Just need to have a CodeChef user id to participate.

New users please register here

- Problem Setter : Constantin Sokol
- Problem Tester : Tasnim Imran Sunny
- Russian Translator : Sergey Kulik
- Editorialist: Praveen Dhinwa
- Mandarin Translator: Gedi Zheng & Minako Kojima

It promises to deliver on an interesting set of algorithmic problems with something for all. Also, it's a great opportunity to warm up before ACM-ICPC World Finals.
The contest is open for all and those, who are interested, are requested to have a CodeChef userid, in order to participate.

UPD!

Just to remind: The contest starts in less than 9 hours.
